Java Distributed Data Acquisition and Control (JDDAC)

JDDAC Common
net.java.jddac.common.exception Provides the Exception classes used in various APIs that compose JDDAC.
net.java.jddac.common.fblock Provides the base Block class used in JMDI but referred to by other APIs that compose JDDAC.
net.java.jddac.common.meas Provides the representation of a Measurement used in various APIs that compose JDDAC.
net.java.jddac.common.meas.collection Provides the classes used to aggregate Measurements.
net.java.jddac.common.type Provides the basic data structures used in various APIs within JDDAC.
net.java.jddac.common.util Provides miscellaneous utility and helper objects used by various APIs within JDDAC.

 

Other Packages
net.java.jddac.jmci.lib Provides the measurement calculus library classes for the Java Measurement Calculus Interface (JMCI).
net.java.jddac.jmci.units Provides support for a higher-level package to perform arithmetic on machine-readable representations of physical quantities.
net.java.jddac.jmdi Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm Provides the communication transport functionality in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm.crypto Provides the encryption and decryption libraries used for network communications in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jmdi.comm.xml Provides the XML encoding and decoding libraries used for network communications in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jmdi.fblock Provides various Function Blocks used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jmdi.gps  
net.java.jddac.jmdi.service Provides the Service classes specified in the IEEE 1451.1 specifications and used in Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jmdi.transducer Provides the measurement data sources.
net.java.jddac.jmdi.util Provides various utility classes used to support Java Measurement Dataflow Interface (JMDI).
net.java.jddac.jti Provides the transducer interfaces used in Java Transducer Interface (JTI).
net.java.jddac.servlets Provides HTTP access to JDDAC services on the portal.
net.java.jddac.struts.actions Provides handlers for actions used within the Struts framework on the server.
